item.title: 特朗普对墨西哥征收关税如何伤害欧洲汽车业
item.description: 据数据、分析师和专家称，唐纳德-特朗普承诺对从墨西哥进口到美国的商品征收关税，这对大众汽车和斯泰伦特等欧洲汽车制造商及其供应商的损害可能比对欧盟商品直接征收关税更大。【原文：Donald Trump's pledge to slap tariffs on imports to the U.S. from Mexico could be more damaging for European car makers like Volkswagen and Stellantis and their suppliers than any direct tariffs on EU goods, according to data, analysts and experts.】

item.title: 美国旅游公司计划在 2025 年前裁员
item.description: 从万豪国际到 Booking Holdings ......总部设在美国的旅游公司正在削减明年的预算和员工人数，因为低收入游客对休闲旅游的需求下降影响了业绩增长。【原文：U.S.-based travel companies, from Marriott International to Booking Holdings . are trimming their budgets and workforce ahead of next year as falling leisure travel demand from lower-income travelers hits top-line growth.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司 2025 年计划假定不再经乌克兰转运至欧洲
item.description: 一位熟悉该计划的人士说，俄罗斯国有控股天然气巨头俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）在其 2025 年内部规划中假定，12 月 31 日之后将不再有天然气经由乌克兰流向欧洲。【原文：Russian state-controlled gas giant Gazprom is making the assumption that no more gas will flow to Europe via Ukraine after Dec. 31 in its internal planning for 2025, a person familiar with the plans said.】

item.title: 雀巢公司董事长认为有必要就产品价格采取行动
item.description: 本周二，雀巢公司董事长保罗-布尔克（Paul Bulcke）被引述说，雀巢需要在价格方面采取行动，以鼓励消费者购买其商品，在此之前，雀巢公司经历了一个充满挑战的阶段，其首席执行官于今年早些时候离职。【原文：Nestle needs to take action on prices to encourage consumers to buy its goods, Chairman Paul Bulcke was quoted as saying on Tuesday following a challenging phase for the company that saw the departure of its CEO earlier this year.】

item.title: 特朗普上任后如何全面改革美国金融监管机构
item.description: 在民主党总统乔-拜登（Joe Bidenh）的领导下，美国金融监管机构为银行、私人基金和其他贷款机构制定了一系列严格的新规则。以下是特朗普上任后可能如何控制这些机构。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump is expected to overhaul U.S. financial regulators, which under Democratic President Joe Bidenhave pursued a slew of stringent new rules for banks, private funds and other lenders. Here's how Trump could take control of the agencies upon taking office.】

item.title: 美国 10 月新屋销售跌至两年低点
item.description: 10 月份，美国新建独栋住宅的销售量降至近两年来的最低水平，这可能是因为抵押贷款利率的上升促使购房者转向观望，以及飓风扰乱了购房活动。【原文：Sales of new U.S. single-family homes dropped to the lowest level in nearly two years in October, likely as a rise in mortgage rates drove buyers to the sidelines and hurricanes disrupted activity.】

item.title: 通用电气就电力部门达成 3.625 亿美元股东和解协议
item.description: 法庭文件显示，通用电气公司（GE Aerospace）将支付 3.625 亿美元现金，以解决股东指控其隐瞒电力业务风险的长期诉讼。【原文：General Electric , doing business as GE Aerospace, will pay $362.5 million in cash to resolve a long-running shareholder lawsuit accusing it of hiding risks at its power business, court papers show.】

item.title: 美国 11 月消费者信心指数进一步上升
item.description: 在对劳动力市场日益乐观和股市反弹的背景下，11月份美国消费者信心进一步增强。【原文：U.S. consumer confidence improved further in November amid growing optimism over the labor market and a stock market rally.】

item.title: 花旗集团聘请贝莱德的 Kate Moore 担任财富首席信息官
item.description: 花旗集团周二宣布，将聘请凯特-摩尔（Kate Moore）担任新财富部门的首席投资官。【原文：Citigroup announced on Tuesday it is hiring Kate Moore as its new wealth division's chief investment officer.】

item.title: 加拿大央行称特朗普提议的关税将影响两国经济
item.description: 加拿大央行周二表示，如果美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普兑现对加拿大征收关税的威胁，这将对两国经济产生影响，央行将把这些影响纳入其经济预测。【原文：The Bank of Canada said on Tuesday that if U.S. President-elect Donald Trump follows through on his threat of tariffs on Canada, it would have an impact on both economies and the central bank would incorporate those into its economic forecasts.】

item.title: 库什塔德公司首席执行官表示，将继续寻求与日本 Seven & i 公司达成交易
item.description: Alimentation Couche-Tard 首席执行官亚历克斯-米勒（Alex Miller）周二表示，该加拿大零售商将继续坚持与日本 Seven & i 公司达成交易的努力，并继续与 7-Eleven 运营商保持 "友好接触"。【原文：Alimentation Couche-Tard CEO Alex Miller said on Tuesday the Canadian retailer would remain persistent in its efforts to pursue a deal with Japan's Seven & i and continue a "friendly approach" with the 7-Eleven operator.】

item.title: 墨西哥总统告诉特朗普关税将加剧通胀、扼杀就业机会
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆周二表示，在美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普承诺对墨西哥和加拿大全面征收 25% 的关税后，她将致信美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普，敦促双方开展对话与合作。【原文：Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum said on Tuesday she would send a letter to U.S. President-elect Donald Trump, urging dialogue and cooperation following his pledge of across-the-board tariffs of 25% on Mexico and Canada.】

item.title: 美国 9 月份月度房价强劲上涨
item.description: 9 月份，美国独户住宅价格稳中有升，再加上抵押贷款利率回升，将进一步降低许多潜在房主的负担能力。【原文：U.S. single-family house prices increased solidly in September, which together with a resurgence in mortgage rates will further reduce affordability for many prospective homeowners.】

item.title: 需求回升、价格上涨，JM 斯玛克上调年度利润预期
item.description: Jif花生酱生产商JM Smucker周二上调了年度利润预期，第二季度业绩好于预期，主要受益于包装食品和冷冻食品需求的回升以及咖啡价格的上涨。【原文：Jif peanut butter maker JM Smucker raised annual profit forecast and beat second-quarter estimates on Tuesday, benefiting from resilient demand for packaged and frozen foods and coffee price hikes.】

item.title: 航空部门官员就特朗普对绿色喷气燃料的影响发出警告
item.description: 据航空官员称，在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的领导下，绿色喷气燃料的推广可能会遭遇重大挫折，他们担心启动该行业所需的税收减免政策会被撤销。【原文：The expansion of green jet fuels could suffer a significant set-back under president-elect Donald Trump, according to aviation officials, who fear the reversal of tax credits needed to kick-start the sector.】

item.title: 标普 500 指数在 2024 年表现强劲后，明年底涨幅将超过 8
item.description: 路透社对股票策略师进行的一项调查显示，随着美国降息以及当选总统唐纳德-特朗普可能减少监管，从现在到 2025 年底，美国 500 指数将上涨 8%以上，从而延续市场的强劲走势。【原文：The S&P 500 will rise over 8% between now and end-2025 as U.S. interest rate cuts and potentially less regulation under President-elect Donald Trump extend the market's strong run, according to a Reuters poll of equity strategists.】

item.title: 假日需求强劲，Abercrombie & Fitch上调年度销售预期
item.description: Abercrombie & Fitch 周二上调了年度销售预期，看好其同名品牌和以青少年为主的 Hollister 品牌的强劲需求。【原文：Abercrombie & Fitch lifted its annual sales forecast on Tuesday, betting on strong demand at its namesake label and its teen-focused Hollister brand.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 VinFast 第三季度亏损收窄，收入超出预期，原因是需求强劲
item.description: 越南电动汽车（EV）制造商 VinFast 周二报告称，由于材料成本降低和产量增加，第三季度净亏损较上年同期减少 5.5 亿美元。【原文：Vietnamese electric vehicle (EV) manufacturer VinFast on Tuesday reported a smaller $550 million net loss for the third quarter compared with a year earlier, helped by lower costs for materials and ramped-up production volumes.】

item.title: 拜登提议将肥胖症纳入医保范围，诺和诺德股价上涨
item.description: 丹麦减肥药生产商诺和诺德公司的股价周二上涨了1.3%，原因是美国总统乔-拜登提议扩大数百万医疗保险和医疗补助计划（Medicare and Medicaid）患者的抗肥胖药物覆盖范围。【原文：Shares of Danish weight-loss drug maker Novo Nordisk rose 1.3% on Tuesday as U.S. President Jo Biden proposed expanding coverage of anti-obesity drugs for millions on Medicare and Medicaid.】

item.title: 欧盟为国际纸业-DS 史密斯交易设定 1 月 10 日最后期限
item.description: 欧盟委员会周二提交的一份文件显示，总部位于美国的国际纸业公司（International Paper）对英国包装公司 DS Smith 58 亿英镑（72.9 亿美元）的收购将由欧盟反垄断监管机构在 1 月 10 日前做出决定。【原文：U.S.-based International Paper's 5.8-billion-pound ($7.29 billion) bid for British packaging firm DS Smith will be decided by EU antitrust regulators by Jan. 10, a European Commission filing showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 百思买因节假日电子产品需求疲软下调年度预期
item.description: 周二，百思买（Best Buy）下调了年度利润和销售预期，表明在电视机和家庭影院系统等高价电子产品需求低迷的情况下，假日购物季将趋于平淡。【原文：Best Buy cut its annual profit and sales forecasts on Tuesday, signaling a muted holiday shopping season amid sluggish demand for pricey electronics such as televisions and home theater systems.】

item.title: 科尔百货下调年度销售预期，原因是假日季前需求低迷
item.description: 科尔百货公司（Kohl's）周二今年第三次下调了年度销售预期，这表明该连锁百货公司正努力在优惠密集的假日购物季前吸引购物者。【原文：Kohl's cut its annual sales forecast for the third time this year on Tuesday, in a sign the department-store chain is struggling to draw in shoppers ahead of a deal-heavy holiday shopping season.】

item.title: 英国警队因内容问题悄然退出 X 平台
item.description: 路透社对英国警察部队的社交媒体产出进行的调查显示，由于对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 社交媒体平台助长暴力和极端内容的担忧持续存在，一些英国警察部队已基本退出了该平台。【原文：Several British police forces have largely withdrawn from Elon Musk's X social media platform as concerns over its role in promoting violence and extreme content persist, a Reuters survey of forces' social media output showed.】

item.title: 阿达尼的 "可再生能源奇迹 "深陷美国贿赂起诉案
item.description: 亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）在印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的清洁能源目标上大做文章，他在法国道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）和卡塔尔投资局（Qatar Investment Authority）的支持下，开始着手建设世界上最大的可再生能源项目。【原文：Betting big on the clean energy goals of Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi, billionaire Gautam Adani found backers in France's TotalEnergies and the Qatar Investment Authority as he set out to build the world's biggest renewable energy project.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称富国银行明年可能取消资产上限
item.description: 据三位熟知内情的消息人士透露，富国银行（Wells Fargo）在解决了假账户丑闻带来的问题后，正处于通过监管测试的最后阶段，以便在明年取消 1.95 万亿美元的资产上限。【原文：Wells Fargo is in the last stages of a process to pass regulatory tests to lift a $1.95 trillion asset cap next year after fixing problems from its fake accounts scandal, according to three sources familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 任天堂 Switch 的中文在线服务将于 2026 年 3 月 31 日停止运营
item.description: 腾讯任天堂 Switch 周二表示，其中国在线服务将从 2026 年 3 月 31 日起逐步停止任天堂 eShop 的运营。【原文：Tencent Nintendo Switch said on Tuesday that its Chinese online service would gradually cease operations for the Nintendo eShop starting from March 31, 2026.】

item.title: 早间竞价特朗普关税威胁震荡加元、比索和人民币
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要或显示关于降息幅度的争论已经开始
item.description: 美联储官员表示，他们目前可能会继续降低利率，投资者仍预计他们将在美国央行12月17-18日的会议上这样做。【原文：Federal Reserve officials say they are likely to keep reducing interest rates for now, and investors still expect them to do so at the U.S. central bank's Dec. 17-18 meeting.】

item.title: 美国新的消费者保护措施开始实施，假日旅行者须知
item.description: 如果你觉得去年的假期旅行太疯狂，那就系好安全带吧。【原文：If you thought last year’s holiday travel was insane, well, buckle your seatbelt.】

item.title: 投资者权衡特朗普的关税威胁，期货走势低迷
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货持平，投资者在连续几个交易日的上涨后暂停交易，并权衡唐纳德-特朗普对主要贸易伙伴征收关税可能对当地经济产生的影响。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were flat on Tuesday, as investors paused following several sessions of gains and weighed the implications Donald Trump's tariffs on top trade partners could have on the local economy.】
